## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G21880](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G21880)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BBX10, COL12</u>
- **Gene Name:** B-box domain protein 10, Constans like 12
- **Description:**   B-box type zinc finger protein with CCT domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2088748
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
